input: ingredients:  '1 stick butter', '2 c. water', '1/2 c. shortening', '2 c. finely chopped apples', '2 c. sugar', '1 1/2 c. self-rising flour', '1/3 c. milk', '1 tsp. cinnamon',<sep> directions: 'Melt butter in 9 x 13 x 2-inch pan.', 'In saucepan, heat water and sugar until sugar melts.', 'Cut shortening into flour until particles are like fine crumbs.', 'Add milk and stir with fork only until dough leaves sides of bowl.', 'Turn out on lightly floured board and knead until smooth.', 'Roll dough into a large rectangle, about 1/4 inch thick.', 'Sprinkle cinnamon over apples and stir. Sprinkle apples evenly over dough and roll up like a jelly roll. Slice 1/2 inch thick and place in pan with melted butter.', 'Pour sugar syrup carefully around apple rolls.', 'Bake at 350° about 1 hour.'

instruction: In this task, you have to generate the title of the recipe given its required ingredients and directions.
input: ingredients:  '1 (8 ounce) can refrigerated crescent dinner rolls', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon mustard', '1 cup ham, finely chopped', '1/2 cup swiss cheese, shredded',<sep> directions: 'Unroll dough and separate into 4 rectangles; press seams to seal.', 'Combine mayonnaise and mustard; spread over rectangles, leaving a 1/2-inch border.', 'Sprinkle ham and cheese evenly over half of each rectangle.', 'Moisten edges with water. Fold dough over and punch edges to seal.', 'Bake at 375°F for 10 minutes or until puffed and golden.'

instruction: In this task, you have to generate the title of the recipe given its required ingredients and directions.
input: ingredients:  '1 jar white onions', '1/4 c. butter', '3/4 c. milk', '1/2 tsp. salt', '2 tsp. pepper', '2 Tbsp. cornstarch', '1/4 c. water',<sep> directions: 'Pour onions into medium saucepan.', 'Cover and simmer over low heat until warm through.', 'Drain.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Add butter and cover until melted.', 'Slowly add milk, stirring constantly.', 'Return to low heat.', 'Add salt and pepper.', 'Heat until warm, stirring gently often.', 'Mix cornstarch and water.', 'While stirring onions, add cornstarch mixture.', 'Stir gently until sauce thickens.', 'Serve immediately.'

instruction: In this task, you have to generate the title of the recipe given its required ingredients and directions.
input: ingredients:  '1  avocado, halved, peeled, pitted, sliced', '1/2  lemon, juiced', '2 tbsp mixed fresh herbs, such as chives, basil and oregano, chopped', '3.5 oz ricotta cheese', '12 slices multigrain bread', '5.25 oz baby arugula', '4 slices prosciutto', '2  tomatoes, sliced',<sep> directions: 'Toss avocado with lemon juice, herbs and black pepper.', 'Spread ricotta over 4 slices of bread. Top with arugula and prosciutto. Add another slice of bread. Arrange avocado and tomato slices on top. Finish with remaining bread. Cut in half diagonally.'

instruction: In this task, you have to generate the title of the recipe given its required ingredients and directions.
input: ingredients:  '8 ounces, weight Low Fat Cream Cheese, Softened', '3 cups Plus 3 Tablespoons Of My Enchilada Gravy (see My TastyKitchen Recipe Box)', '6 ounces, weight Canned Diced Green Chiles', '18 ounces, weight Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breast, Grilled Or Baked And Chopped', '6 whole (10 Inch) Flour Tortillas', '1- 1/2 cup Shredded Mozzarella Cheese', 'Fresh Cilantro Leaves As Garnish',<sep> directions: 'Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Spray a 9x9 baking dish lightly with cooking spray.', 'In a medium bowl, combine cream cheese, 3 Tablespoons of my Enchilada Gravy, and green chiles.', 'Mix well.', 'Add the cooked chicken cubes and fold to combine.', 'Fill each tortilla with 1/3 cup of the chicken mixture.', 'Place tortillas in baking dish and fold each to seal.', 'Ladle 3 cups of Enchilada Gravy over filled tortillas, then sprinkle with cheese.', 'Bake for 15-20 minutes, until cheese is melted.', 'Then place oven on high broil and place baking dish on the top rack.', 'Watch closely and broil for about 3 minutes, or until cheese is lightly browned and bubbling.', 'Remove from oven and allow to cool for 15 minutes.', 'Garnish with fresh cilantro leaves and serve.'

instruction: In this task, you have to generate the title of the recipe given its required ingredients and directions.
input: ingredients:  'FOR THE COLESLAW DRESSING', '1 tablespoon fresh finely minced garlic', '1 1/4 cups mayonnaise', '1/3 cup yellow mustard', '3 1/2 tablespoons sugar', '1 tablespoon black pepper', 'FOR THE COLESLAW', '15 cups shredded green cabbage', '2 cups shredded purple cabbage', '1 1/2 cups finely chopped yellow onions', '3/4 cup finely chopped green bell pepper', '2 tablespoons chopped green onions', '2 cups coleslaw dressing',<sep> directions: 'TO MAKE DRESSING:', 'In a mixing bowl combine all ingredients.', 'Stir well and refrigerate.', 'TO MAKE SLAW:', 'In a large mixing bowl, combine vegetables. Using hands, toss well. Add dressing. Toss and serve.'

instruction: In this task, you have to generate the title of the recipe given its required ingredients and directions.
input: ingredients:  '1 c. flour', '1 c. sugar', '1 1/2 tsp. baking soda', '3/4 c. milk', '1 stick margarine', '2 1/2 c. fruit and juice',<sep> directions: 'Cut up margarine and line bottom of baking dish.', 'Mix other ingredients except fruit and juice, pour over margarine.', 'Spoon fruit and juice over mixture.', 'Bake at 375° about 45 minutes. Serve hot.'

instruction: In this task, you have to generate the title of the recipe given its required ingredients and directions.
input: ingredients:  '3 c. defatted chicken', '2 Tbsp. flour', '2 tsp. water', '1 egg white', '1 Tbsp. angostura low-sodium soy sauce', '4 tsp. finely chopped chives or scallion tops',<sep> directions: 'Bring the chicken stock to boil.', 'With a wire whisk, mix together egg whites, flour and water until smooth.', 'Pour a thin stream into boiling chicken stock.', 'Do not stir until egg mixture is cooked.', 'Add the soy sauce and mix well.', 'Ladle into consomme cups and top each serving with 1 teaspoon chopped chives or scallion tops.', 'Makes 3 cups.', 'Each 3/4 cup serving contains approximately 42 calories, 0 mg cholesterol and 167 mg sodium.'

instruction: In this task, you have to generate the title of the recipe given its required ingredients and directions.
input: ingredients:  '1/2 cup diced yellow tomato', '1/4 cup zucchini strips', '1/4 cup sliced red onion', '1/4 cup red bell pepper strips', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh oregano', '1/2 teaspoon salt, divided', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, divided', '4 (6-ounce) striped bass fillets', '2 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese', '4 teaspoons fresh lemon juice',<sep> directions: 'Preheat oven to 500°.', 'Combine first 7 ingredients, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon black pepper in a small bowl. Toss gently.', 'Cut 4 (24-inch) lengths of parchment paper. Fold each in half; open each. Place 1 fillet near fold on each. Sprinkle fillets with 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon pepper. Top each evenly with vegetable mixture, feta cheese, and lemon juice.', 'Fold paper; seal edges with narrow folds. Place packets on baking sheets. Bake at 500° for 10 minutes or until puffed and lightly browned. Place on plates; cut open. Serve immediately.', 'Note: You may use aluminum foil in place of parchment paper.'
